about_the_game:
Action to the rhythm of Heavy Metal

Fight and destroy the dark soldiers while you are advancing and hearing heavy metal songs and complete the stage for see the next epic cinematic!

True Deep Action

Unleash all your fury on the battlefield and slash your enemies into pieces! The true hack and slash it´s here! Giving a true combo system gameplay with the same controls and deep combo system of the bests! With lot of cinematics and legendary medieval charachters! feel in your hands! and in your PC! a true hack and slash game! not an easy and repetitive game like the rest! Here you will have to learn how to play! become stronger! learn to do attacks! combos! movements! use special attacks and much more! like if you are playing a true 3D hack and slash like the old times... You are bored of easy simple games withouth cinematics? erase them! now it´s time to download Hack And Slash Fury!!! Show your sword! Unleash your fury! Destroy all your enemies!!! And save the world of the hands of Tyranny And Destruction!!! And see with your own eyes tons of Scenarios! epic Cinematics! and epic Soundtracks!!!! 

Lot Of Cinematics

Experiment a full canonic Story Mode wich wants to give a cinematic and manga shonen style with charachters of great lore and strong personality forged in war, after each stage a new cinematic it's waiting for you, advance on this epic history while you are fighting against lot of enemies and new scenarios.

Deep Combo System

Multiple combo routes which offers multiple advantages regardling to your current position and the one of the upcoming enemies, use each combo route with brain so you can unleash all your true potential and destroy all your enemies fiercely.

Fury Mode

Prepare for enter a state wich will increase your speed but decrease your hit precission, use it for gain more Fury Attacks Bar and do damage fastly, when it's ending do the Special Super Movement and destroy all your enemies in front of you with an epic movement of slow motion time.

Fury Attacks

Use Fury Attacks Bar to do fastly charged attacks and stop your enemies with great hits and extend your combos even more.

Dinamic Scenario Ambientation

No scenario will be the same the next time you play It, the textures, sky and music will change randomly for each scenario, tons of combinations giving the impression the scenario has completely changed, and there is lot of completely new scenarios with tons of posible combinations, replayability it's giant on this game.

FPS/TPS Camera

Change the camera view while you are fighting, change from the classical charachter camera to an inmersive first person like FPS games or play with a third person camera with less zoom to fully see your charachter, and only pressing a button!

No Coin restrictions

Fully free History mode withouth no need to pay for continue playing, only the cosmetics are selled via dlc.

Epic Soundtrack

Enjoy Heavy Metal Obsidian Shell Music for Stages and Orquestal ones of other musicians for Cinematics.

10-15 hours Story Mode

A Great War between Light and Dark Empires with great rivalities between memorable charachters With lots of cinematics, enemies, stages, combos, type of attacks and great learning curve.

Customizable Enemy Speed

More slower on easy difficulties giving a more paused gameplay and more fast on harder difficulties to give a more fast gameplay experience.

Your Mouse it´s your Sword(or use gamepad)

Move with mouse, attack and do combos combining the left and right click, rotate the camera with the wheel and press it to use the main Fury attack!!! only you will have to use keyboard on specific cases like activate fury mode, enable movement, change view zoom or pause the game.

Finally a True Hack And Slash

Stop of play easy and repetitive games, this haves a great learning curve to exploit all your potential, you will be able to dominate the fury state, fury mode, combos, position, dash and destroy all your enemies to see the upcoming cinematic? while you are hearing heavy metal songs and experiencing an epic history about war between Dark And Light Empire?

content_descriptors.notes: Blood on Gameplay, violent cutscenes, obscene language, some crazy charachter.
